name: ligue-1
title: Ligue 1
description: Staying up-to-date with the latest scores, and fixtures from the French top-flight football league in Raycast.
author: anhthang

commands.name: table
commands.title: Standings
commands.description: Check the latest standings for both Ligue 1 and Ligue 2, as well as access past season data.

commands.name: result
commands.title: Fixtures & Results
commands.description: Find the latest match schedule and results for both Ligue 1 and Ligue 2, including historical data.

commands.name: club
commands.title: Clubs
commands.description: Discover information about all the clubs participating in Ligue 1 and Ligue 2, including player rosters, statistics, and team news.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
